title: Sounds of Swordom : Pack 1
description: “Forge Your Battle, Unleash the Sound of War”
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


"Presenting ‘Sounds of Swordom: Pack 1’


With every sword hit, stab, or scrape being slightly different from the others in tonality, texture, and the gain envelope, it’s these subtle variations that make the difference in sound design, ensuring each hit sounds unique and avoids monotony.


Each foley sound effect of swords in this pack has been crafted using industry-leading foley creation tools and further polished in our go-to DAW. This sound pack offers a range of effects from lots of single stabs and hits to some mass slaughters sound files, cut-bleedings, and sword scrapes.


So elevate your game’s auditory experience with ‘Sounds of Swordom: Pack 1’ and let players feel the steel’s edge and the warrior’s resolve."

Only product thumbnail is CreatedWithAI
technicalDetails:
Features: 

Sword Foleys Are Well-Organized Into The Following Folders:-

0_Sword_Hits_Ringing - 50 FOLEY SFX (Added from pack MEDIAEVAL WEAPONS: SIMPLE BLADES)

1_Swords_Slice-And-Stabs - 698 FOLEY SFX

2_Swords_Hits-And-Impact - 122 FOLEY SFX

3_Swords_Mass_Slaughter - 4 FOLEY SFX

4_Sword_Gently_Slaughtered_Flesh-Slicing - 28 FOLEY SFX

5_Swords_Scrapes - 52 FOLEY SFX

6_Swords_Bleed_Flesh_Cuts - 184 FOLEY SFX



Number of Audio Waves: 1138

Number of Audio Cues: 1138

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 17:35

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
